response.overview: A Special Thank You Note... On behalf of 3Angels Power Film Production INC (Owned by 3 sisters: Gladys, Jeanne d'arc, and Mona Lisa Karam) Supervised, and documented by their mom Mona Karam, a professional/volunteer photographer..  I  thank all the ones who participated (volunteer actors, crew members/music artists/composers from Egypt, Lebanon, UK,  U.S.A, and Canada) in our international experimental feature presentation "Chi Ann Blaze of Fury". Let's not forget that we had our share of struggle to finish this movie since 2019 up to our present time. Therefore, we decided to make "Chi Ann Blaze of Fury" accessible, and available for all to watch free of charge. But any contributions or donations by our fans and viewers would be highly appreciated (3angelspower@gmail.com).  Remember, together we can make the impossible possible, and open doors for others.
response.title: Chi Ann Blaze of Fury
